code: /* import Library */import React from'react';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var history=useHistory();/* Detail 페이지로 이동하기 */var goDetailPage=function goDetailPage(id){history.push('/detail/'+id);};/* 숫자에 콤마(,)추가하여 표시 */var addComma=function addComma(num){var regexp=/\B(?=(\d{3})+(?!\d))/g;return num.toString().replace(regexp,',');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"col-lg-4 col-md-6 opacity",style:{cursor:'pointer'},onClick:function onClick(){goDetailPage(props.shoes.id);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:'https://codingapple1.github.io/shop/shoes'+(props.i+1)+'.jpg',width:"100%"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:props.shoes.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[props.shoes.content," & ",addComma(props.shoes.price)]})]},props.id);}export default Card;
